title: MediaBrix Named One Of The "Best Entrepreneurial Companies In America" By Entrepreneur Magazine
text:
MediaBrix
Mobile Advertising Technology Platform MediaBrix Honored as One of Entrepreneur Magazine's Inaugural Entrepreneur 360 Award Winners, Recognizing Innovation, Growth and Customer Commitment in the Mobile Advertising Industry
NEW YORK , Oct. 21, MediaBrix ( www.MediaBrix.com ), the global leader in delivering emotionally charged brand connections through contextually relevant ad products, announced today that they have been recognized by Entrepreneur magazine's inaugural Entrepreneur 360 Awards as one of the "Best Entrepreneurial Companies in America." MediaBrix was honored for the award at the October 7 e360 Conference and in the November issue of Entrepreneur magazine.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151020/278837
Named as an entrepreneurial "Classic" for its sales confidence and customer-first approach, MediaBrix ranks among the highest echelon of entrepreneurial companies due to its sustained growth (fiscally and in employment), commitment to innovation, and company culture, among other factors. The company has steadily advanced its mission of increasing user receptivity in mobile advertising since its founding in 2011, including the launch of its newly refined products and platform to advertisers. MediaBrix, who also recently opened up a London office, has refined its targeting, contextualization and delivery of ads during emotional Breakthrough Moments™, in order to create a more intuitive, sensory and seamless experience for users.
"With much of the digital advertising industry in turmoil and transition, we are very pleased to be recognized by Entrepreneur for providing solutions that rise above the issues and deliver real results to our customers," said Ari Brandt , CEO of MediaBrix. "We are committed to our mission and collaborating with brands to lead the charge in a new era of engaging, consumer-first digital advertising. At MediaBrix, we remain entrepreneurs at our core, constantly innovating, and are thrilled to be named among the best."
"Those honored have identified a problem, come up with a unique solution, and bravely built their enterprises around it," says Ryan Shea , president of Entrepreneur Media, Inc.. "They've accomplished new ways of producing sustainable growth and are an inspiration to others who want to fulfill their own entrepreneurial goals."
The Entrepreneur360™ Performance Index is a premier study delivering the most comprehensive analysis of private companies in America, measuring company worth not only monetarily, but in terms of real-world value. Through in-depth surveys, the team of editors and researchers behind the E360 Performance Index collected more than 250 pieces of data from hundreds of participating U.S. based companies. The analysis uncovered a subset of companies including MediaBrix, whose continued success is largely based on superior value creation for their customers, building an adaptive learning culture, and aggressive geographic expansion-making them the most dynamic firms in America today.
"The companies identified in the E360 Index are sustained growers and based on our research have proven adept at navigating the changing challenges of their marketplace to win new business and grow their output capacity year after year," says Gary Kunkle , senior research fellow at the Business Dynamics Research Consortium and research partner of the E360 Performance Index.
For more information about to integrate MediaBrix as part of your strategy, please visit: www.MediaBrix.com
For additional details on the E360 Performance Index and the companies recognized, visit: http://entm.ag/E360Index
About MediaBrix
MediaBrix delivers emotionally charged brand connections that maximize consumer receptivity during mobile advertising experiences. As the only solution of its kind, we Rescue, Rally and Reward users with our proprietary product suite when they are emotionally available, leading to in-app campaign engagement rates 500 percent higher than all other digital formats. One of the fastest-growing companies in the U.S. by Inc. 500|5000, MediaBrix is used by hundreds of the world's top brands and thousands of leading app and game developers, who leverage the MediaBrix platform to deliver over 500 million contextually relevant Breakthrough Moments® to more than 200 million global mobile users each month, all with 100 percent viewability. For more information, visit: www.MediaBrix.com .
About Entrepreneur Media Inc.
For nearly 40 years, Entrepreneur Media Inc. has been serving the entrepreneurial community providing comprehensive coverage of business and personal success through original content and events. Entrepreneur magazine, Entrepreneur.com, and publishing imprint Entrepreneur Press provide solutions, information, inspiration and education read by millions of entrepreneurs and small business owners worldwide.
